quote.issuer_name: China Maple Leaf Educational Systems Ltd.
quote.nm: China Maple Leaf Educational Systems Ltd.
quote.summary: hina Maple Leaf Educational Systems Ltd is a company primarily engaged in the provision of international school education. The Company mainly operates its business through two segments. The People’s Republic of China (PRC) segment engages in the operating of bilingual private schools and preschools in PRC under the Maple Leaf band. The Overseas segment engages in the operating of bilingual private schools and preschools in Southeast Asia under the brand of Canadian International School (CIS) and Kingsley International School (KIS). The Company’s schools include high schools, middle schools, elementary schools, preschools and foreign national schools. The Company is also engaged in the education industry chain business including sales of ancillary products and provision of catering services to students. The Company mainly conducts its business in the domestic and overseas markets.
